name: Anthropic API
description: The Claude API — the AI backbone for most agent systems. Full programmatic access to Claude models with prompt caching, streaming, tool use, and the Files API.

name: Composio
description: Unified tool platform purpose-built for AI agents. 400+ integrations with managed OAuth, multi-tenant auth, and event triggers — all accessible via API without ever touching a dashboard.

name: Modal
description: Serverless cloud for Python supporting GPU workloads, batch jobs, and web endpoints. Deploy directly from code using decorators via CLI and SDK — no dashboard interaction required.

name: AgentOps
description: Observability and analytics platform built specifically for AI agents. Provides session replays, cost tracking, and error detection via Python SDK and REST API. YC-backed with a free tier.

name: Brave Search API
description: Independent web search with a privacy focus. Fully API-accessible with no scraping required, free tier includes 2k requests per month. Official MCP server available for agent integration.

name: Browserbase
description: Headless browser infrastructure built for AI agents. Stealth browsing, session management, live debugging, and CAPTCHA solving — all via API. No UI needed, ever.

name: Chroma
description: Open source embedding database supporting in-process and client/server modes. Zero configuration required with Python and JavaScript SDKs, designed specifically for AI application development.

name: Cloudflare Workers AI
description: Run LLM inference at the edge via Cloudflare Workers. Includes AI Gateway for LLM proxying, R2 object storage, D1 SQLite, and KV storage — all accessible via REST API, Wrangler CLI, and MCP server.

name: Crawl4AI
description: Open source async web crawler built for LLMs and AI agents. Returns structured markdown content, supports JSON extraction and screenshot capture, with MCP server and CLI included.

name: E2B
description: Secure sandboxed cloud environments for AI agents to execute code. Instant provisioning, full internet access, file system, and terminal — programmatic API with sub-second startup.

name: Exa
description: Neural search API for the web — finds the exact content AI agents need using embeddings-based retrieval instead of keywords. Built for machine consumption with clean structured responses.

name: Firecrawl
description: Web scraping and crawling API that returns LLM-ready markdown. Handles JavaScript rendering, pagination, and anti-bot measures. Has an Agent endpoint for multi-step autonomous browsing.

name: Fireworks AI
description: Fast LLM inference API with function calling and JSON mode. Sub-100ms latency with 100+ open source models available. Python and Node SDKs. YC W23 with bot-friendly signup.

name: Groq
description: Ultra-fast LLM inference on custom LPU hardware with an OpenAI-compatible API. Provides the fastest inference available for popular models. Python and JavaScript SDKs with a free tier.

name: Inngest
description: Background jobs and durable workflows as code with SDK-first event-driven design. Supports fan-out, step functions, and automatic retries. TypeScript and Python SDKs. Open source and self-hostable.

name: Jina AI
description: Reader API converts any URL to LLM-ready markdown instantly. Also provides embeddings, reranker, and classifier APIs with a generous free tier for AI agent and RAG pipeline integration.

name: LanceDB
description: Embedded multimodal vector database with columnar storage using the Lance format. No server required. Supports Python, JavaScript, and Rust with free open source licensing.

name: Logfire
description: Observability platform by Pydantic built on OpenTelemetry with built-in LLM instrumentation. Python SDK and CLI with free self-hosting option for monitoring AI agents and LLM applications.

name: Mem0
description: Persistent memory layer for AI agents that stores and retrieves memories across sessions. Manages user preferences, facts, and context via API and Python/JS SDKs with an MCP server available.

name: Neon
description: Serverless Postgres with instant branching and scale-to-zero. Over 80% of Neon databases are created by agents — supports full database provisioning, branching, and querying via REST API.

name: OpenAI API
description: GPT-4o, o3, and Embeddings via REST API. Built-in tool calling, assistants, structured outputs, and the Responses API — the platform most agent frameworks target first.

name: PostHog
description: Open source product analytics, session recording, and feature flags platform. Full REST API with Python, Node, PHP, Ruby, and Go SDKs. Self-hostable with a generous free cloud tier.

name: Qdrant
description: Open source vector database with payload filtering for hybrid search. Available as cloud managed or self-hosted with full REST/gRPC API, Python/JS/Rust/Go SDKs, and an official MCP server.

name: Replicate
description: Run ML models via API with over 10000 models for image, video, audio, and code generation. Simple REST API with Python, Node, and Go SDKs — no GPU setup or infrastructure management required.

name: Resend
description: Email API built for developers with React Email templates and clean REST API design. SDKs in TypeScript, Python, Ruby, PHP, Go, and Java with a generous free tier. YC-backed.

name: Spider
description: Open source web crawler and scraper built for AI agents. Returns clean markdown content, handles JavaScript rendering, and supports fast bulk crawling via API and Python/Node SDKs.

name: Steel
description: Cloud browser infrastructure purpose-built for AI agents. Provides sessions, proxies, and CAPTCHA solving via API with no headless browser setup required for running browser-based agents.

name: Tavily
description: Real-time web search API purpose-built for AI agents and RAG pipelines. Returns structured, citable results optimized for LLM consumption — not human reading.

name: Tigris
description: Globally distributed object storage with S3-compatible API. No region configuration needed with automatic replication. CLI and TypeScript, Python, Go SDKs available with a free tier.

name: Together AI
description: LLM inference platform for open source models with OpenAI-compatible API. Supports fine-tuning, embeddings, and function calling with Python and JavaScript SDKs and a free tier.

name: Trigger.dev
description: Open source background jobs platform with a code-first approach for long-running tasks and scheduled jobs. TypeScript SDK with self-hosting support and automatic retries. YC-backed.

name: Turso
description: SQLite at the edge with multi-tenant support. Instant per-tenant database creation via REST API, libsql protocol, and CLI. TypeScript, Python, Rust, and Go SDKs for easy agent integration.

name: Upstash
description: Serverless Redis and Kafka with per-request pricing — zero cold starts, HTTP REST API for agents that can't maintain persistent connections. 100% programmatic provisioning via API.

name: Vapi
description: Voice AI infrastructure for building, testing, and deploying voice agents via REST API. Real-time transcription and LLM integration for phone-based AI agents. Python and TypeScript SDKs. YC S23.

name: Apify
description: Serverless web scraping platform with 4,000+ pre-built Actors for any website. Full API for scheduling, running, and retrieving results. Native MCP integration and CrewAI/LangChain support.

name: Arize AI
description: ML observability and LLM tracing platform. Includes Phoenix open source for local tracing and cloud deployment for production. Trace LLM calls, run evals, and detect model drift.

name: Basis Theory
description: Tokenization infrastructure and Browser Proxy API for agentic payments. PCI-compliant vault service that lets AI agents handle payment credentials without storing raw card data.

name: Cohere
description: Enterprise LLM platform providing Generate, Embed, and Rerank APIs with tool use and function calling support. SDKs in Python, TypeScript, Go, and Java for building RAG and agent applications.

name: Hyperbrowser
description: Cloud browser for AI agents with an API to start sessions, navigate pages, and extract data. Includes computer use support and an MCP server for direct agent integration.

name: LangGraph
description: Low-level orchestration framework for building stateful, long-running agents as directed graphs. Handles durable state, human-in-the-loop, and multi-agent coordination with a hosted platform.

name: LangSmith
description: LLM observability platform for tracing, evaluating, and monitoring AI agent runs. Deep LangChain integration with full REST API access for programmatic trace analysis and dataset management.

name: LlamaIndex
description: Open source data framework for LLM applications. Connect to data sources, parse documents, and build RAG pipelines with Python and TypeScript SDKs. Extensive integrations with vector stores.

name: LlamaParse
description: Proprietary document parser by LlamaIndex for extracting structured data from complex PDFs containing tables and images. Accessible via REST API and Python/TypeScript SDKs with a free tier.

name: Mistral AI
description: European AI lab providing fast and efficient LLM models with chat, embeddings, and function calling. OpenAI-compatible API with Python and JavaScript SDKs for easy agent integration.

name: Pinecone
description: Managed vector database for semantic search and agent long-term memory. Serverless with instant provisioning, hybrid search, and a dedicated Pinecone Assistant endpoint for RAG workloads.

name: Prefect
description: Python workflow orchestration with code-first pipeline definitions. REST API, Python SDK, and CLI for building and monitoring data pipelines. Cloud and self-hosted deployment options.

name: PropelAuth
description: Auth for B2B SaaS with multi-tenant organizations, role-based access control, and full API management. Webhook notifications and Python/Node SDKs for programmatic user and org management.

name: PydanticAI
description: Python agent framework by the Pydantic team with type-safe agents, dependency injection, tool use, and streaming. Supports OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and other model providers. MCP client support included.

name: Redis Cloud
description: Managed Redis with vector search, pub/sub, and caching capabilities. Includes an official MCP server and SDKs across all major languages for caching, real-time data, and vector similarity search.

name: Sentry
description: Error tracking, performance monitoring, and session replay with SDKs in 100+ platforms. REST API, CLI, MCP server for AI error analysis, and webhooks for automated agent error workflows.

name: SerpApi
description: Structured Google/Bing/and other search engine results via REST API. Agent-friendly signup with no CAPTCHA. Supports Python, Ruby, Node, Go, and PHP SDKs for easy integration.

name: smolagents
description: Minimal agent framework by Hugging Face where code agents write and execute Python to complete tasks. Small codebase designed for easy extension with MCP support for tool integration.

name: Stagehand
description: Open source browser automation framework by Browserbase. AI-native with act(), extract(), and observe() primitives for intuitive browser control. TypeScript-first built on top of Playwright.

name: Stripe
description: Payment infrastructure with agentic commerce features — Shared Payment Tokens for agent-initiated transactions, full REST API, and an official MCP server for payment operations.

name: Stytch
description: Developer-first auth platform providing magic links, passkeys, OAuth, and M2M tokens for agent-to-agent authentication. Full REST API with Python, Node, Go, and Ruby SDKs.

name: Supabase
description: Open-source Firebase alternative with Postgres, auth, storage, and edge functions. Full REST and GraphQL APIs, CLI for all operations, MCP server for AI-assisted database management.

name: Temporal
description: Durable execution engine for long-running workflows. Define workflows as code with automatic retries and state persistence. SDKs in Python, Go, Java, TypeScript, and PHP with open source core.

name: Twilio
description: Communications API platform for SMS, voice, email, and WhatsApp. REST API with SDKs in 7 languages and extensive webhook support for building programmable communication agents.

name: Unstructured
description: Document parsing and ETL pipeline for LLMs. Extracts and chunks text from PDFs, Word documents, HTML, and email into clean structured output. REST API plus open source Python library.

name: Voyage AI
description: State-of-the-art embedding and reranking models for RAG applications. REST API and Python SDK with specialized domain models for code, finance, and legal use cases. Free tier available.

name: Weaviate
description: Open source vector database with built-in ML model integrations for semantic search. Supports GraphQL and REST APIs with Python, JavaScript, Go, and Java SDKs. Cloud managed available.

name: Weights & Biases
description: ML experiment tracking, dataset versioning, and model registry platform. Python SDK, REST API, and CLI included. LLM tracing via Weave for monitoring agent and LLM application performance.

name: WorkOS
description: Enterprise-ready auth platform for SSO, SCIM provisioning, MFA, and admin portal. REST API with Node, Python, Ruby, and Go SDKs for rapid enterprise authentication integration.

name: Auth0
description: Identity platform by Okta supporting OAuth, OIDC, and SAML. Management API for programmatic user management with SDKs in Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, and Ruby. Some features require dashboard setup.

name: Bright Data
description: Enterprise web data platform with residential proxies, SERP API, and an Agent Browser with built-in CAPTCHA solving. Massive scale for production data pipelines powering AI training.

name: Clerk
description: User authentication platform with machine-to-machine (M2M) tokens — designed for services that agents need to call on behalf of users. Full API and SDK, programmatic user/org management.

name: CrewAI
description: Role-based multi-agent orchestration framework. Define agent crews with goals and tools, run them autonomously. 4,000+ tool integrations via Composio, async execution, MCP server support.

name: DSPy
description: Framework for programming language models rather than prompting them. Compilers automatically optimize prompts and weights for your pipeline. Python-only open source project from Stanford.

name: ScrapingBee
description: Web scraping API with JavaScript rendering and proxy rotation. Provides a REST API with Python, Node, Ruby, and PHP SDKs for handling anti-bot measures and dynamic content extraction.

name: SendGrid
description: Email delivery platform by Twilio for transactional and bulk email. REST API with SDKs in Python, JavaScript, Java, PHP, Ruby, and Go. Requires human account verification for setup.
